title: Blended Medical Education Program for Competency Enhancement Based on Clinical Cases

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Medical Terminology and Patient Care Procedures
context.additional_context: Practical-focused education for medical institution managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can make decisions with over 80% accuracy in complex clinical scenarios through a three-stage case analysis (pre-consultation, face-to-face, post-consultation)
Learners can record and share over 90% of weekly learning content using smartphone-based tools
Learners improve leadership competencies by at least 75% in team-based problem-solving processes through peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
